alert.note: Alert for Durham; Franklin; Granville; Johnston; Vance; Wake; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 10:31AM EDT until May 27 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EDT FOR VANCE...WESTERN WARREN...GRANVILLE...WAKE...NORTHWESTERN JOHNSTON...EASTERN DURHAM AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 1030 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near La Crosse to near Warrenton to 6 miles south of Norlina to 8 miles southeast of Henderson to near Louisburg to Raleigh, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Henderson, Oxford, Creedmoor, Louisburg, Warrenton, Wake Forest and Garner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Durham; Franklin; Granville; Johnston; Vance; Wake; Warren
